metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o   Serve as a dip or side dish. Som Tum (Green Papaya Salad)    Ingredients : o   1 green papaya  o   2 tomatoes  o   1 carrot  o   2 cloves garlic  o   2 tablespoons fish sauce  o   2 tablespoons lime juice  o   1 tablespoon sugar  o   1 tablespoon peanuts  o   1-2 Thai chilies     Instructions : o   Peel and shred green papaya and carrot. o   Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing.

•   1 whole wheat tortilla  •   1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced  •   1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped  •   2 tablespoons Caesar dressing  •   2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese  •   Optional: croutons for extra crunch  Instructions: •   Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. •   Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. •   Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

•   1 cup cooked sushi rice  •   1/2 cucumber, julienned  •   1/2 avocado, sliced  •   1/4 cup carrot, julienned  •   2 sheets nori (seaweed)  •   Soy sauce for dipping  Instructions: •   Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. •   Arrange the cucumber, avocado, and carrot in a line along the bottom edge of the rice. •   Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce.
Cook until the eggs are set and the vegetables are tender. •   Cook in the skillet until the tortilla is golden brown and crispy. •   Serve with salsa.

1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced     8 cups beef broth    1 small onion, sliced     2 cloves garlic, minced     1 piece ginger, sliced     2 star anise     1 cinnamon stick     1 tablespoon fish sauce     1 tablespoon soy sauce     8 ounces rice noodles     Fresh basil, cilantro, bean sprouts, lime wedges, and sliced jalapeños for garnish  Instructions:    In a large pot, bring beef broth to a boil.    Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.    Divide noodles and thinly sliced beef among bowls.
